name: Pixel Run
description:
Pixel Run is a old fashioned pixel art infinite runner. In Pixel Run you gain points by surviving the longest on the constantly moving platforms. Spinning diamonds you can collect along the way doubles the amount of point you gain. The simple up and down movements makes it easy to control but hard to keep up with the for ever changing blocked paths in your way. Pixel Run is VisionStudios first ever pixel art game. We would hope to see this game coming to all of your mobile devices in the near future. If you like these sort of games please feel free to contact us saying you want to see more pixel art games with the contact information provides below. If you want to see more of our amazing games please go and check out our website here

Contact Us on: VisionStudios@mail.com
